title: Arkansas Firm Recalls Ground Turkey Products Due to Possible Salmonella Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, August 3, 2011 - Cargill Meat Solutions Corporation, a Springdale, Ark. establishment, is recalling approximately 36 million pounds of ground turkey products that may be contaminated with a multi-drug resistant strain of Salmonella Heidelberg, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service...

establishment.name: Cargill Meat Solutions
establishment.address:
730 E. Randall Wobbe Lane 
  Springdale, AR 72764

impacted_products: Ground Turkey Chubs - Use or Freeze by Dates of 2/20/11 through 8/23/11
5% Ground Turkey - Use or Freeze by Dates of 2/20/11 through 8/23/11
